entries.name: Grave Elk
entries.description: A spectral stag that walks silent mist trails at dusk. Harmless unless provoked.

entries.name: Mistfen Stag
entries.description: Antlers grown from twisted root. It vanishes into vapors when threatened.

entries.name: Hollow Boar
entries.description: Bone-plated boar that charges with echoing howls. Empty sockets glow at night.
